metadata.name: NO WAR
metadata.description:
It's such a terrifying and stressful time. 
As an artist with Ukrainian roots my heart is bleeding for all the innocent people who got involved in these political games.

I believe that the war is never the answer, because the anger breeds only the misery and destruction.

But I think if each of us could find a strength to create something kind and beautiful, we will live in a new world full of peace and love.

Stay safe.
